Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2001...
Had first career hit on 4/5/2005, off Johan Santana (LAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2005, off Mark Brandenburg (PHI)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Houston on 9/11/2005...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Los Angeles (A) on 2/8/2006 (Going to PIT: DH J. Fernandez, CF J. Edmonds, P J. Devine, C J. Thole. Going to LAA: 2B R. Cano)...
Was selected to the 2008 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/13/2009, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2009, hitting .398 with 7 HR, 27 RBI...
Won World Championship with Los Angeles (A) in 2009...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (A) on 5/2/2010...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2010, hitting .396 with 11 HR, 41 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2010, hitting .422 with 7 HR, 28 RBI...
Was selected to the 2010 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 9/3/2010...
Won World Championship with Los Angeles (A) in 2010...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2010, hitting .367 with 36 HR, 161 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 5/20/2011...
Was selected to the 2011 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Minnesota on 5/2/2012...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/2012, hitting .609 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2012 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 7/24/2012...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/2012, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/2013, hitting .381 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2013, hitting .386 with 11 HR, 32 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/2013, hitting .458 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Detroit on 6/21/2013...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Seattle on 5/29/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/2014, hitting .500 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 9/9/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/4/2015, hitting .450 with 5 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2015, hitting .336 with 7 HR, 23 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 4/18/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/23/2016, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Baltimore on 7/27/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/30/2016, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/27/2016, hitting .389 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/5/2017, off Benton Haris (DET)...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Pittsburgh on 6/30/2017 (Going to LAA: SS J. Profar. Going to PIT: SS R. Gotay, 3B K. Cowart, CF E. Marzilli, 2B R. Cano, RF I. Boone Jr.)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2017, hitting .483 with 6 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2017, hitting .354 with 13 HR, 30 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Houston, driving in 4 runs on 4/17/2018...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 8/29/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/3/2018, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 2/10/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $11,000,000 per year...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Chicago (N) on 6/30/2019 (Going to CHN: P P. Misch, 2B R. Cano. Going to LAA: P H. Conner, P F. Andujar)...
Injured on 7/26/2019 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/12/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
